A museum dedicated to the star that fell to Earth, showcasing artifacts and exhibits that tell the story of the star's journey from the cosmos to our planet.
A reality TV show that follows a team of scientists and astronomers as they race against time to study the star before it disappears from view.
A virtual reality experience that allows users to walk on the surface of the star and explore its interior.
A novel that explores the star's impact on human culture and society, from the scientific community to the general public.
A music album inspired by the star's journey and the emotions it evokes in those who encounter it.
